NAME: Calling
NOTES: Gathers animals at up to extreme range

NAME: Enhanced
NOTES: Use Power rank for one animal trait.

NAME: Selection
NOTES: Mimic multiple at -1d per additional animal.

NAME: Block
NOTES: Ranged Active Defense but not vs area.

NAME: Block Missiles
NOTES: Ranged Active Defense vs physical but not area.

NAME: Melee Weapon
NOTES: Melee Active Defense and melee stunts

NAME: Ranged Weapon Master
NOTES: May use power rank for a weapon attack value

NAME: Greater
NOTES: May increase bonus by +1d/resolve up to +3d.

NAME: Kinetic Energy
NOTES: Counts as the first type of Energy Absorbed

NAME: Deflect
NOTES: Active Ranged Defense but not vs area

NAME: Deflect Missiles
NOTES: Active Ranged Defense vs physical but not area

NAME: Melee Weapon Master
NOTES: May use power rank for a weapon attack value

NAME: Affects Inanimate
NOTES: May affect one source of animate objects per choice.

NAME: Area
NOTES: Up to 50 ft diameter chosen per use.

NAME: Blink
NOTES: Adds +2d to attack or defense chosen each turn.

NAME: Build-Up
NOTES: Cannot be used in the first two turns

NAME: Burnout
NOTES: Roll 2d on a 6 or less out for the scene

NAME: Carrier
NOTES: Inflicts a secondary attack after 1 dmg or 1 page of effect.

NAME: Close, from ranged
NOTES: Limits range from distant to close

NAME: Concentration
NOTES: Expires any action is taken including moving and defending

NAME: Contagious
NOTES: Attacks anyone that touches the original target

NAME: Degrades
NOTES: Loses 1d per use over the scene

NAME: Delay
NOTES: Too long to be useful in combat

NAME: Exclusive
NOTES: Must be taken on 2+ powers which cannot be used together.

NAME: Fuse
NOTES: Delay up to willpower hours or control within extreme range.

NAME: Imbue
NOTES: Share with a touch up to willpower subjects

NAME: Zone
NOTES: Up to 25 ft diameter chosen per use
